title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 644.2 - Preservation of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 644.2 - Preservation of records

State Regulations

All records required by this Part shall be preserved for
the period of time specified in Part 651 of this Title, unless otherwise
specified by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
644.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
